dashboardDescription: Explore a world of exciting math games designed for kids from kindergarten to grade 8. Sharpen your skills, solve puzzles, and make learning math fun and engaging!

battleship-numberline.title: Battleship Numberline
battleship-numberline.description: Master various math concepts using an interactive numberline in this engaging Battleship game.

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Practice adding numbers on a numberline

equation.title: Equation
equation.description: Solve equations and plot the answers on a numberline

fraction.title: Fraction
fraction.description: Learn to work with fractions on a numberline

decimal.title: Decimal
decimal.description: Perfect your decimal placement skills on a numberline

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: Boost your understanding of percentages on a numberline

think-bigger.title: Think Bigger
think-bigger.description: Enhance your understanding of numbers through interactive challenges.

place-value.title: Place Value
place-value.description: Enhance your understanding of place value

magnitude-comparison.title: Magnitude Comparison
magnitude-comparison.description: Compare numbers based on their magnitude

bubble-pop.title: Bubble Pop
bubble-pop.description: Solve various math challenges while popping number bubbles.

mcq.title: MCQ
mcq.description: Solve multiple-choice questions by popping number bubbles

in-order.title: In-order
in-order.description: Arrange numbers in the correct order by popping the number bubbles

skip-n.title: Skip N
skip-n.description: Skip every Nth number and pop the correct bubbles

drag.title: Drag
drag.description: Drag and drop numbers to the correct locations while popping the bubbles

fill-in-the-blank.title: Fill in the Blank
fill-in-the-blank.description: Fill in the missing numbers by popping the correct number bubbles

clock-game.title: Clock Game
clock-game.description: Practice reading and setting clocks through various challenges.

analog.title: Analog
analog.description: Practice reading and setting analog clocks

stop-the-clock.title: Stop the Clock
stop-the-clock.description: Test your skills by stopping the clock

place-value.title: Place Value
place-value.description: Master place value concepts through interactive challenges.

click.title: Click
click.description: Click on the correct value to match the place value

drag.title: Drag
drag.description: Drag and drop numbers to their correct places

drag-to-make.title: Drag To Make
drag-to-make.description: Drag numbers to form correct values

highest.title: Highest
highest.description: Identify the highest value based on place value

make.title: Make
make.description: Create numbers by placing digits in their correct place values

match.title: Match
match.description: Match numbers to their correct place values

mcq.title: MCQ
mcq.description: Test your knowledge of place value concepts through multiple-choice questions

change.title: Change
change.description: Change place values to form new numbers

math-fact.title: Math Fact
math-fact.description: Practice your math facts and enhance your fluency in basic arithmetic operations.

train-game.title: Train Game
train-game.description: Help the train move by solving counting challenges.

jelly-bean.title: Jelly Bean
jelly-bean.description: Engage with interactive challenges to understand numbers better.

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.description: Compare different numbers of jelly beans

odd-or-even.title: Odd or Even
odd-or-even.description: Sort jelly beans into odd and even categories

drag-and-drop.title: Drag and Drop
drag-and-drop.description: Drag and drop jelly beans to the correct place

counting.title: Counting
counting.description: Count jelly beans to enhance your basic number skills
